sentence.Network_en: The car passed over the body twice, once backward and then forward.
sentence.Network_cn: 那辆车把那人来回轧了两次，先是倒着轧的，再是往前开着轧的。

sentence.Network_en: They are in twice daily radio contact with the rebel leader.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们每天用无线电和叛军首领联系两次。

sentence.Network_en: The legislation has twice been rejected by the House of Lords.
sentence.Network_cn: 该法规已经两次遭到上议院的否决。

仁爱英语七年级下册单词_百度文库 ... week 星期，周 twice 两次；两倍 every 每一，每个的.
twice went close with long - range efforts ., 两度远射几乎得手.

大学英语四级常用词组 ... think through 思考…直到得出结论 think twice 重新考虑 think up 发明；设计出.

idiom17双面人、得... ... 15.重操旧业 back in the saddle 16.一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井绳 once bitten,twice shy 17.选择退出 opt out.
昨天我梦见你了用英语怎么说_百度知道 ...  think twice 三思而后行三思而后行 Think it over.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English twiges, from the base of two + -s (later respelled -ce to denote the unvoiced sound); compare with once

encyclopedia.content: twice是一个英文单词，有两次,两回；两倍；强得多,好得多等多种解释，是一个副词。

entry.def: If something happens twice, there are two actions or events of the same kind.

example.ex: He visited me twice that fall and called me on the telephone often...
example.tran: 那年秋天他来看过我两次，而且经常给我打电话。

example.ex: The government has twice declined to back the scheme…
example.tran: 政府已两次拒绝支持该方案。

entry.tran: (表示频率)每天两次/一周两次
entry.def: You use twice in expressions such as twice a day and twice a week to indicate that two events or actions of the same kind happen in each day or week.

example.ex: I phoned twice a day, leaving messages with his wife...
example.tran: 我每天打两次电话，托他妻子捎口信。

example.ex: This famous horse race has taken place here twice a year since 1310.
example.tran: 这一著名的赛马比赛自 1310 年以来每年在这里举行两次。

entry.def: If one thing is, for example, twice as big or old as another, the first thing is two times as big or old as the second. People sometimes say that one thing is twice as good or hard as another when they want to emphasize that the first thing is much better or harder than the second.

example.ex: The figure of seventy-million pounds was twice as big as expected.
example.tran: 7,000 万英镑的金额是预期的两倍。

example.ex: …a report claiming that teachers could be twice as effective if they returned to traditional classroom methods.
example.tran: 声称教师若重新采用传统课堂讲授方法，授课效果会事半功倍的报告

entry.tran: 重新考虑;慎重考虑;思忖再三
entry.def: If you think twice about doing something, you consider it again and decide not to do it, or decide to do it differently.

example.ex: She'd better shut her mouth and from now on think twice before saying stupid things.
example.tran: 她最好闭上嘴巴，而且今后在说出蠢话之前先过过脑子。

auth_sentence.content: On this showing, about twice should do it.
auth_sentence.res_content: On this showing, about twice should do it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On this showing, about twice should do it.

auth_sentence.res_content: Ms Rousseff is twice divorced and has one daughter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ms Rousseff is twice divorced and has one daughter.

auth_sentence.content: So we made all those things twice as fast.
auth_sentence.res_content: So we made all those things twice as fast.

stems_affixes.word_buile: twi二,两+form形状+ed……的→adj.有两种形式的
twi二,两+n→adj.&n. 双胞胎[的],双[的],成对[的]

Sentence.sentence: Get key information by reading just once or twice.

Piling on higher taxes won't help, "If higher taxes make it more expensive to raise children," says Nicholas Eberstadt of the American Enterprise Institute, "people will think twice about having another child.
To advise couples to think twice before having children
The stack of congressional regulations governing federal student grants and loans now stands twice as tall as I do.

sentences.cn: 鲍勃今天打了两次电话。

sentences.en: This box is twice as large as that one.
sentences.cn: 这个盒子是那个盒子的两倍。

jushi.chinese: 鲍勃今天打了两次电话。

jushi.english: This box is twice as large as that one.
jushi.chinese: 这个盒子是那个盒子的两倍。

jushi.english: He earns twice as much as I do.
